DateText: 5th century AH/AD 11th century-6th century AH/AD 12th century
Title: Illuminated Headpiece with Arabesque Design and Marginal Medallion at Left
Medium: ink and pigments on brown laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.555 contains a headpiece illuminated in gold and decorated with an arabesque design. There is a marginal rosette at the left.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Abbasid; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Headpiece; Illumination; Manuscript; Ornament; 'Kufic'; New Abbasid Style; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
